# cocode.dk - Babak Bandpey

> AI agent development, workflow automation, and cybersecurity compliance for Danish SMEs. Based in Copenhagen, Denmark. Every AI agent built is secure and compliant from day one.

Babak Bandpey connects AI models to real business systems — task management, calendars, codebases, compliance platforms — so businesses can automate repetitive knowledge work. 10+ years of cybersecurity compliance experience (CIS18, DORA, NIS2, ISO27001, EU AI Act).

## Services

- [AI Agent Development](https://cocode.dk/#ai-integration): Building production-ready AI agents that integrate with business systems via the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Custom agent pipelines using Claude, OpenAI, and other LLM platforms.
- [MCP Server Development](https://cocode.dk/#mcp-development): Creating Model Context Protocol servers that connect AI assistants to business tools, databases, and APIs.
- [AI Workflow Automation](https://cocode.dk/#fullstack-innovation): Connecting AI models to business tools to automate document processing, task management, scheduling, and knowledge work.
- [Cybersecurity & AI Governance](https://cocode.dk/#cybersecurity-audit): Expert audits for CIS18, DORA, NIS2, ISO27001 compliance. AI-specific governance and EU AI Act compliance.

## Projects

- [Planner Task Creator MCP](https://github.com/cocodedk/Planner-Task-Creator-CLI-MCP): MCP server connecting AI assistants to Microsoft Teams Planner. OAuth authentication, task management, smart plan/bucket resolution. Python, Node.js, MCP.
- [Calendar Consolidator MCP](https://github.com/cocodedk/calendar-consolidator-mcp): Consolidates multiple calendars (Microsoft 365, iCloud/CalDAV) into a unified view. One-way sync, delta updates, web UI. Python, MCP, CalDAV.
- [CodeScan](https://github.com/cocodedk/codescan): Static code analyzer that builds a Neo4j graph database of codebases. AST-based parsing, call graph construction, test coverage detection. Python, Neo4j, MCP.
- [FITS.DK](https://fits.dk): Full GRC platform for governance, risk, and compliance. AI-powered gap assessments, RAG conversations, automated project planning. Supports ISO27001, CIS v8, HIPAA, GDPR, NIST. Django, Neo4j, Redis.
